## Aims of this lesson

* Understand the machine learning process before traininf a ML model 

* Learn about a couple of techniques to select most imnportant features.  



## Content of this lesson

* Load the data
* Understand your data using descriptive statistics
* Understand your data using visualisation techniques
* Prepare your data for Machine Learning models
* Feature selection for Machine Learning
